courseDescription:
The Python program setup and basics lessons are essential to acquiring a solid foundation that can then be built upon. After establishing that structure, the course shifts to more advanced functionalities like RegEx (regular expression) and CGI programming, covering a multitude of subjects such as advanced expressions, and the get and post methods. In between, learners are provided with detailed lessons on classes and objects, including class inheritance and the initialization method. The material also covers databases, with lessons on setting up a database and editing the information contained within it. The lessons also include tutorials on creating networking servers and clients that connect to them. Multithreading is another topic that is covered, with lessons on subjects such as thread creation and synchronization. The final course module details the GUI (graphical user interface), covering various widgets and elements such as text, menu, and a message box.

This course focuses on various subjects within the realm of programming and development. Some subjects are more specific to Python, but most of the material is applicable in programming as a whole. The lessons provide detail on almost all aspects of programming that are currently in use throughout the world and in all types of applications. Each lesson supplies ample explanation so that the information being covered gets absorbed in full. And, all of the tutorials include step-by-step guides that learners can apply on their own to get a further enhancement on their learning experience. A GitHub link to the source files is included for this purpose. The detailed assessments throughout the course and at its conclusion will test your knowledge of the material. Another advantage of this online course is that it is free. So enroll now and benefit from the comprehensive programming lessons that the course offers.
